document_data.name: House Jordain
document_data.Entomology: The word "jordain" originated from the [[Old Netherese]] language, the progenitor language to the [[Halruaan language]]. It meant "fool," however the meaning of the word was different in the days of the ancient empire. A fool was a counselor and entertainer of kings, an individual who advised their lord through witting satire of song and dance.
